import React from "react"; import styled from "styled-components"; export default function Butonlar(props) { const { page, setPage, handlePage } = props; const StyledButton = styled.div` ${(props) => props.page === props.props.value ? `background-color: green` : `background-color: red`} `; return (
handlePage("1")} value="1" page={page} value={1} > Page 1 handlePage("2")} page={page} value={2}> Page 2 handlePage("3")} page={page} value={3}> Page 3 handlePage("4")} page={page} value={4}> Page 4 handlePage("5")} page={page} value={5}> Page 5 handlePage("6")} page={page} value={6}> Page 6 handlePage("7")} page={page} value={7}> Page 7 handlePage("8")} page={page} value={8}> Page 8 handlePage("9")} page={page} value={9}> Page 9
); }
